net.realmproject.dcm.event

Interface DeviceEvent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IDeviceEvent

    public interface DeviceEvent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDeviceId()
      Gets the ID of the device which originally published this event
      DeviceMessageType getDeviceMessageType()
      Gets the type of this event
      java.lang.String getRegion()
      Gets the region this event was published in
      java.util.Date getTimestamp()
      Gets the time that this event was published (according to the computer which published it)
      java.io.Serializable getValue()
      Gets the payload of this event
      boolean isPrivateEvent()
      Private events are events which are not meant to be propagated beyond the region they were emitted in.
      void setPrivateEvent(boolean privateEvent)
      Sets this event as private.
      void setRegion(java.lang.String region)
      The region property is an arbitrary string representing what part of a larger network of devices the event originated from, and is usually not set by the publishing device, but by a component like a DeviceEventBus

    • Method Detail

      • getDeviceId

        java.lang.String getDeviceId()
        Gets the ID of the device which originally published this event
        Returns:
        id of the originating device

      • getDeviceMessageType

        DeviceMessageType getDeviceMessageType()
        Gets the type of this event
        Returns:
        the type of this event

      • getValue

        java.io.Serializable getValue()
        Gets the payload of this event
        Returns:
        The payload of this event

      • getTimestamp

        java.util.Date getTimestamp()
        Gets the time that this event was published (according to the computer which published it)
        Returns:
        date of publication

      • getRegion

        java.lang.String getRegion()
        Gets the region this event was published in
        Returns:
        region of origin

      • setRegion

        void setRegion(java.lang.String region)
        The region property is an arbitrary string representing what part of a larger network of devices the event originated from, and is usually not set by the publishing device, but by a component like a DeviceEventBus
        Parameters:
        region - the region this event originates from

      • isPrivateEvent

        boolean isPrivateEvent()
        Private events are events which are not meant to be propagated beyond the region they were emitted in. DeviceEventBus implementations should not broadcast private events from other regions.
        Returns:
        true if this event is private, false otherwise.

      • setPrivateEvent

        void setPrivateEvent(boolean privateEvent)
        Sets this event as private.
        Parameters:
        privateEvent - indicates if this event is private.
